mapper.select: select r5.*, vegetable.vegetable_name from ( select r4.*, seafood.seafood_name from ( select r3.*, cereals.cereals_name from ( select r2.*, milk.milk_name from ( select r1.category_num, r1.recipe_num, meat.meat_name from recipe_category r1 left outer join meat on r1.category_num = meat.meat_num where r1.recipe_num = #{num}) r2 left outer join milk on r2.category_num = milk.milk_num) r3 left outer join cereals on r3.category_num = cereals.cereals_num) r4 left outer join seafood on r4.category_num = seafood.seafood_num) r5 left outer join vegetable on r5.category_num = vegetable.vegetable_num

recipe_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
